Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Looking at the corresponding section for Linux, I think you should also support the integer_battery_capacity option :).

Author: anonymous
Comment: I will do that, shall I combine that with this patch or shall I submit a new patch?

Author: Jasper Lievisse Adriaanse
Comment: Actually, apm(4) on OpenBSD only reports the battery life in whole digits. I.e., implicitly 'integer_battery_capacity' is always used.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Then please add a comment explaining that.
